success.description: If the request was successful or not

active_flag.description: Whether the note is active or deleted

add_time.description: The creation date and time of the note

update_time.description: The creation date and time of the note

content.description: The content of the note in HTML format. Subject to sanitization on the back-end.

object_id.description: The ID of the object that the comment is attached to, will be the id of the note

object_type.description: The type of object that the comment is attached to, will be "note"

user_id.description: The ID of the user who created the comment

updater_id.description: The ID of the user who last updated the comment
